summary: This document is a response from Lockheed Martin to a subpoena related to the case of United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. It details various helicopter sales agreements and legal entities associated with the transactions, including Air Ghislaine, Inc. and Hyperion Air LLC, which are linked to Epstein and Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is the defendant in the case referenced in the subpoena.

persons.name: Douglas Jacobs
persons.context: Douglas Jacobs is mentioned in connection with Five Star Holding Company LLC, which is involved in the agreements related to Air Ghislaine, Inc.

persons.name: Christina Emens
persons.role: Regulatory Compliance Lead and Litigation Case Manager
persons.context: Christina Emens is the author of the correspondence, representing Lockheed Martin in the legal matter.

connections.description: Ghislaine Maxwell is associated with Air Ghislaine, Inc., which is involved in helicopter sales agreements.
Hyperion Air LLC is tied to Epstein and Maxwell, with agreements executed for them.
Douglas Jacobs is associated with Five Star Holding Company LLC, which is involved in the agreements with Air Ghislaine, Inc.

events.title: Helicopter Sales Agreement Awarded
events.description: A new helicopter sales agreement was awarded to Air Ghislaine, Inc.

events.title: Helicopter Delivered
events.description: The helicopter under contract S76TD6167 was delivered to Air Ghislaine, Inc.

events.title: Second Helicopter Delivered
events.description: A second helicopter was delivered to Shmitka Air, Inc., which is linked to Air Ghislaine, Inc.

events.title: Aircraft Delivery Acceptance
events.description: Hyperion Air LLC accepted delivery of an aircraft from ASI Wings LLC.

keyFacts: The document is a response to a subpoena issued in the case of United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.
Air Ghislaine, Inc. is involved in multiple helicopter sales agreements linked to Ghislaine Maxwell.
Hyperion Air LLC is noted as being tied to Epstein and Maxwell, with agreements executed for them.
Douglas Jacobs is associated with Five Star Holding Company LLC, which is involved in the agreements.
The document outlines various contracts and agreements related to helicopter sales and services.
